00020 TScene *s;                             //our scene
00021 int msaa = 1;                          //multisample count
00022 const int SHADOW_RES = 2048;
00023

00040 //*****************************************************************************
00041 //Initialize OpenGL settings for scene
00042 bool InitScene(int resx, int resy)
00043 { 
00044     s = new TScene();
00045     if(!s->PreInit(resx, resy, 0.1f, 10000.0f, 45.0f, msaa)) 
00046         return false;
00047 
00048     try{
00049         //source for cubemaps
00050         const char *cubemap[] = {   "../data/tex/cube/positive_x.tga", "../data/tex/cube/negative_x.tga",
00051             "../data/tex/cube/positive_y.tga", "../data/tex/cube/negative_y.tga",
00052             "../data/tex/cube/positive_z.tga", "../data/tex/cube/negative_z.tga" };
00053 
00054         //position camera
00055         s->RotateCamera(20.0, A_X);
00056         s->RotateCamera(20.0, A_Y);
00057         s->MoveCamera(0.0,0.0,-150.0);
00058         s->SetCamType(cam_type);
00059 
00060         //add objects
00061         s->AddObject("skybox",CUBE,5000.0,5000.0);
00062         s->AddObject("ground",PLANE,500.0,500.0);
00063         s->AddObject("sphere",SPHERE,20.0,20.0, 32, 32);
00064 
00065         //position objects
00066         s->MoveObj("sphere", 0.0, 20.0, 0.0);
00067 
00068         //add materials & textures
00069         s->AddMaterial("mat_sky",white,white,white,0.0,0.0,0.0,NONE);
00070         s->AddTexture("mat_sky",cubemap);
00071 
00072         s->AddMaterial("mat_ground",black,white,white,0.0,0.0,0.0,NONE);
00073         s->AddTexture("mat_ground","../data/tex/asphalt.tga", BASE, MODULATE, 1.0, 5.0, 5.0, true, true);
00074 
00075         s->AddMaterial("mat_sphere");      
00076 
00077         //assign materials to objects        
00078         s->SetMaterial("skybox","mat_sky");        
00079         s->SetMaterial("ground","mat_ground");
00080         s->SetMaterial("sphere","mat_sphere");
00081          
00082         //set lighting & shadows
00083         s->AddLight(0, black, silver, white, glm::vec3(-200, 150, 200));
00084         s->SetShadow(0, SHADOW_RES, SPOT, 0.3f);
00085         s->CastShadow("skybox",false);
00086         s->ReceiveShadow("mat_sky", false);
00087 /*                        
00088         //enable global effects (HDR & SSAO)
00089         s->UseHDR();
00090         s->UseSSAO();  
00091         s->CreateHDRRenderTarget(-1, -1, GL_RGBA16F, GL_FLOAT);    //prepare HDR render target for effects     
00092 
00093         //HDR settings
00094         s->SetUniform("mat_tonemap","exposure", 1.0);
00095         s->SetUniform("mat_tonemap","bloomFactor",1.0);
00096         s->SetUniform("mat_tonemap","brightMax",1.2);
00097         s->SetUniform("mat_bloom_hdr_ssao","THRESHOLD",0.5);
00098         //SSAO settings
00099         s->SetUniform("mat_bloom_hdr_ssao","intensity",1.6);
00100         s->SetUniform("mat_bloom_hdr_ssao","radius",2.0);
00101         s->SetUniform("mat_bloom_hdr_ssao","bias",1.5);
00102 */
00103     }
00104     catch(int)  //catch possible errors
00105     {
00106         cerr<<"Initialization failed.";
00107         return false;
00108     }
00109     //done, call post init    
00110     return s->PostInit();
00111 }

00114 //*****************************************************************************
00115 //Main drawing function
00116 void Redraw()
00117 {
00118     //update FPS camera
00119     if(cam_type == FPS)
00120     {
00121         s->MoveCameraAbs(pos.x, pos.y, pos.z);
00122         s->RotateCameraAbs(rot.x, A_X);
00123         s->RotateCameraAbs(rot.y, A_Y);
00124     }
00125     //call scene renderer
00126     s->Redraw();
00127     cycle++;                          //increment draw counter 
00128 
00129     if(draw_text)
00130     {
00131         //FPS info
00132         string msg = num2str(fps) + " fps";
00133         s->DrawScreenText(msg.c_str(),50.0,1.0,1.0);           
00134     }
00135 }

00137 //*****************************************************************************
00138 //Keyboard input
00139 const float INC = 1.0;
00140 void KeyInput(SDLKey key)
00141 {
00142     glm::vec3 lpos1 = s->GetLightPos(0);
00143 
00144     //FPS camera rotation and position
00145     glm::vec2 rotrad;
00146     rot = s->GetCameraRot();
00147     pos = s->GetCameraPos();
00148 
00149     switch(key)
00150     {     
00151     case SDLK_x:         //X - wireframe
00152         wire = !wire;
00153         s->Wireframe(wire);
00154         break;
00155 
00156         //camera type switch
00157     case SDLK_c:
00158         if(cam_type == FPS)
00159             cam_type = ORBIT;
00160         else
00161             cam_type = FPS;
00162         s->SetCamType(cam_type);
00163         break;
00164 
00165         //FPS camera movement (WSAD)
00166     case SDLK_s:
00167         rotrad.y = (rot.y / 180 * PI);
00168         rotrad.x = (rot.x / 180 * PI);
00169         pos.x += 5*INC*float(sin(rotrad.y));
00170         pos.z -= 5*INC*float(cos(rotrad.y));
00171         pos.y -= 5*INC*float(sin(rotrad.x));
00172         break;
00173     case SDLK_w: 
00174         rotrad.y = (rot.y / 180 * PI);
00175         rotrad.x = (rot.x / 180 * PI);
00176         pos.x -= 5*INC*float(sin(rotrad.y));
00177         pos.z += 5*INC*float(cos(rotrad.y));
00178         pos.y += 5*INC*float(sin(rotrad.x));
00179         break;
00180     case SDLK_d:
00181         rotrad.y = (rot.y / 180 * PI);
00182         pos.x -= 5*INC*float(cos(rotrad.y));
00183         pos.z -= 5*INC*float(sin(rotrad.y));
00184         break;
00185     case SDLK_a:
00186         rotrad.y = (rot.y / 180 * PI);
00187         pos.x += 5*INC*float(cos(rotrad.y));
00188         pos.z += 5*INC*float(sin(rotrad.y));
00189         break;
00190 
00191         //light movement
00192     case SDLK_i: lpos1.z -= INC; s->MoveLight(0,lpos1); break;
00193     case SDLK_k: lpos1.z += INC; s->MoveLight(0,lpos1); break;
00194     case SDLK_j: lpos1.x -= INC; s->MoveLight(0,lpos1); break;
00195     case SDLK_l: lpos1.x += INC; s->MoveLight(0,lpos1); break;
00196     case SDLK_u: lpos1.y += INC; s->MoveLight(0,lpos1); break;
00197     case SDLK_o: lpos1.y -= INC; s->MoveLight(0,lpos1); break;
00198 
00199     case SDLK_ESCAPE:        //ESCAPE - quit
00200         delete s;
00201         SDL_Quit();
00202         exit(0);
00203         break;
00204     default:
00205         break;
00206     }
00207     //cout<<"LIGHT: "<<lpos1.x<<","<<lpos1.y<<","<<lpos1.z<<endl;
00208     //s->PrintCamera();
00209 }

00219 int status;                                     //which button?
00220 void MouseClick(SDL_Event event)
00221 { 
00222     status = event.button.button;
00223 
00224     //hide cursor at moving
00225     if(status == SDL_BUTTON_LEFT)
00226         SDL_ShowCursor(SDL_DISABLE);
00227     else
00228         SDL_ShowCursor(SDL_ENABLE);
00229 }
00230 
00236 void MouseMotion(SDL_Event event)
00237 {
00238     //camera movement
00239     if(cam_type == FPS && status == SDL_BUTTON_LEFT)  //FPS camera
00240     {
00241         rot.x += event.motion.yrel;     //set the xrot to xrot with the addition of the difference in the y position
00242         rot.y += event.motion.xrel;     //set the xrot to yrot with the addition of the difference in the x position
00243     }
00244     else    //orbiting camera
00245     {
00246         int x = event.motion.xrel;
00247         int y = event.motion.yrel;
00248         if(status == SDL_BUTTON_LEFT)   //rotate
00249         {
00250             s->RotateCamera(float(y), A_X);
00251             s->RotateCamera(float(x), A_Y);
00252         }
00253         else if(status == 4)  //zoom.  proc nefuguje??SDL_BUTTON_RIGHT
00254             s->MoveCamera(0.0f, 0.0f, x);
00255         else if(status == SDL_BUTTON_MIDDLE)  //position
00256             s->MoveCamera( x, -y, 0.0f);
00257     }
00258 }

00264 void WrongParams()
00265 {
00266     cout<<"Wrong parameters.\n"
00267         "Usage: gluxEngine.exe [-w|-f resX resY][-aa value]\n"
00268         "Parameters:\n"
00269         "-w,-f: windowed/fullscreen mode\n"
00270         "resX, resY: screen resolution in pixels\n"
00271         "-aa: antialiasing strength (0,1 = off)\n";
00272     exit(1);
00273 }

00277 //********************************* MAIN ********************************************************//
00279 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00280 {
00281     //application settings
00282     string param;
00283     msaa = 1;
00284     bool fullscreen = false;
00285     int resx = 1024, resy = 640;
00286 
00287     //parse parameters
00288     for(int i=1; i<argc; i++)
00289     {
00290         param = argv[i];
00292         //fullscreen/windowed mode
00293         if(param == "-w" || param == "-f")
00294         {
00295             if(param == "-w")
00296                 fullscreen = false;
00297             else if(param == "-f")
00298                 fullscreen = true;
00299             //display resolution
00300             if(i+2 < argc)
00301             {
00302                 resx = atoi(argv[i+1]);
00303                 resy = atoi(argv[i+2]);
00304                 i += 2;
00305             }
00306             else
00307                 WrongParams();
00308         }
00310         //antialiasing
00311         else if(param == "-aa")
00312         {
00313             if(i+1 < argc)
00314             {
00315                 msaa = atoi(argv[i+1]);
00316                 i++;
00317             }
00318             else
00319                 WrongParams();
00320         }
00322         //disable screen text
00323         else if(param == "-notext")
00324             draw_text = false;
00326         //error
00327         else
00328             WrongParams();
00329     }
00330 
00331     //initialize SDL video
00332     SDL_putenv("SDL_VIDEO_CENTERED=center");
00333     if(SDL_Init(SDL_INIT_VIDEO) < 0) 
00334         exit(1);
00335 
00336     //enable double buffering with a 24bit Z buffer.
00337     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_RED_SIZE, 8);
00338     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_GREEN_SIZE, 8);
00339     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_BLUE_SIZE, 8);
00340     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_DOUBLEBUFFER, 1);
00341     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_DEPTH_SIZE, 24);
00342 
00343     //enable multisampling
00344     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_MULTISAMPLEBUFFERS, 1);
00345     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_MULTISAMPLESAMPLES, msaa);
00346 
00347     SDL_WM_SetCaption("gluxDEMO", 0);
00348 
00349     //set video mode
00350     int mode = SDL_OPENGL;
00351     if(fullscreen)
00352         mode |= SDL_FULLSCREEN;
00353 
00354     if(SDL_SetVideoMode(resx, resy, 32, mode) == NULL)
00355     {
00356         ShowMessage("Display mode not supported!\n");
00357         SDL_Quit();
00358         return 1;
00359     }
00360     /*
00361     #ifndef _LINUX_
00362     //doesn't work/exist on a testing linux system. Exists in SDL 1.3
00363     //turn off vsync
00364     SDL_GL_SetSwapInterval(0);
00365     #endif
00366     */
00367     //init GLEW
00368     if(glewInit() != GLEW_OK)
00369     {
00370         ShowMessage("GLEW initialization failed!\n");
00371         SDL_Quit();
00372         return 1;
00373     }
00374 
00375     //init scene
00376     if(!InitScene(resx,resy)) 
00377         exit(1);
00378 
00379     SDL_WarpMouse((Uint16)resx/2, (Uint16)resy/2);
00380 
00381     //Main loop
00382     SDLKey key = SDLK_UNKNOWN;
00383     bool keypress = false;
00384     SDL_Event event;
00385     int time_now, time_nextMS, time_nextS, last_keypress = 0;
00386     time_now = time_nextMS = time_nextS = SDL_GetTicks();
00387 
00388     /*
00389     //init AntTweakBar
00390     TwInit(TW_OPENGL, NULL);    
00391     TwWindowSize(resx, resy);
00392     controls = TwNewBar("Controls");
00393     //add variables
00394     TwAddVarRO(controls, "exposure", TW_TYPE_FLOAT ,&exposure, "");
00395     TwAddVarRO(controls, "Width", TW_TYPE_INT32, &resx, 
00396     " label='Wnd width' help='Width of the graphics window (in pixels)' ");
00397 
00398     TwAddVarRO(controls, "Height", TW_TYPE_INT32, &resy, 
00399     " label='Wnd height' help='Height of the graphics window (in pixels)' ");
00400     */
00401     while(true)
00402     {
00403         //measure time
00404         time_now = SDL_GetTicks();
00405 
00406         if(time_now >= time_nextMS) //increment animation after 10ms
00407         {
00408             time_nextMS += 10;
00409         }
00410         if(time_now >= time_nextS) //increment time after one second
00411         {
00412             time_nextS += 1000;
00413             //save FPS
00414             fps = cycle;
00415             cycle = 0;
00416         }
00417 
00418         //call drawing functions
00419         Redraw();
00420         //TwDraw();
00421         SDL_GL_SwapBuffers();
00422 
00423         //handle events with SDL
00424         if(SDL_PollEvent(&event))
00425         {
00426             int handled = TwEventSDL(&event, SDL_MAJOR_VERSION, SDL_MINOR_VERSION);
00427             if(!handled)
00428             {
00429                 if(event.type == SDL_QUIT)
00430                     break;
00431                 //keyboard events
00432                 else if(event.type == SDL_KEYDOWN)
00433                 {
00434                     keypress = true;
00435                     last_keypress = time_now;
00436                     key = event.key.keysym.sym;         //store pressed key
00437                 }
00438                 else if(event.type == SDL_KEYUP)
00439                     keypress = false;
00440                 //mouse events
00441                 else if(event.type == SDL_MOUSEMOTION)
00442                 {
00443                     MouseMotion(event);
00444                     MouseClick(event);
00445                 }
00446             }
00447         }
00448 
00449         //call keyboard handle when key pressed
00450         if(keypress && (time_now - last_keypress > 150 || last_keypress == time_now) ) 
00451             KeyInput(key);
00452     }
00453 
00454     //deinitialize SDL and scene
00455     delete s;
00456     //TwTerminate();
00457     SDL_Quit();
00458     return 0;
00459 }
